jcr:root:
<jcr:content jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="wcm/core/components/policies/mappings" cq:policy="<%= appId %>/components/page/generic"> <root cq:policy="<%= appId %>/components/container/page-root" jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="wcm/core/components/policies/mapping"> <<%= appId %> jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured">
<title cq:policy="<%= appId %>/components/title/page" jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="wcm/core/components/policies/mapping"/> <text cq:policy="<%= appId %>/components/text/content" jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="wcm/core/components/policies/mapping"/> <teaser cq:policy="<%= appId %>/components/teaser/content" jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="wcm/core/components/policies/mapping"/> <download cq:policy="<%= appId %>/components/download/content" jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="wcm/core/components/policies/mapping"/> <image cq:policy="<%= appId %>/components/image/content" jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="wcm/core/components/policies/mapping"/>
</<%= appId %>>
